Articles.Content:
I have not seen any Gemini replicas on the forums so I created this to fill that gap:

Uses stock revamp.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/A7jmG/)

THIS DOES NOT GO TO ORBIT WITH FAR OR NEAR, stock should work.

Comes with heat shield and LOTS of clipping.

Also, feel free to post your own Gemini replicas.

Enjoy:

[http://kerbalx.com/Kerbalcrafts/Gemini](http://kerbalx.com/Kerbalcrafts/Gemini)

- - - Updated - - -

Thank you for your patience while I updated this thread.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T01:39:01Z" title="03/13/2015 01:39  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

Looks good!

> 
> I have not seen any Gemini replicas on the forums so I created this to fill that gap

![2.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9346020/Gemini%20XIIII/2.png)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60981-Gemini-XIIII-and-Titan-III](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60981-Gemini-XIIII-and-Titan-III) (no hyper edit needed ;-) )

Nice work on that Gemini, I really like the upside down lights and the antennas for the docking port.

I'm thinking of updating mine, I might use those tricks.
